voxelsniper.sniper.missing-permission: &cNie masz uprawnień do wykonania tej akcji. Brakuje Ci uprawnień &b'{0}'
voxelsniper.art.paint.final-painting: &cTo jest ostateczny obraz, spróbuj przewinąć w drugą stronę.
voxelsniper.command.cannot-parse-input: Nie można przetworzyć danych wejściowych bloku.
voxelsniper.command.invalid-number: &cNieprawidłowa liczba: &b{0}&c, musi należeć do zakresu od &b{1} &cdo &b{2}&c.
voxelsniper.command.invalid-enum: &cNieprawidłowa wartość: &b{0}&c, musi być jedną z następujących. {1}
voxelsniper.command.default.reset: &bUstawienia pędzla są resetowane do wartości domyślnych.
voxelsniper.command.voxel-sniper.debugpa: &cNie udało się przesłać debugpaste z powodu &b{0}
voxelsniper.brush.biome.info:
&6Parametry Pędzla Biomu:
&b/b bio [t] -- Ustawia wybrany typ biomu na t.
&b/b bio list -- Wyświetla listę wszystkich dostępnych biomów.
voxelsniper.brush.clean-snow.info:
&6Parametry Pędzla Czystego Śniegu:
&b/b cls [true|false] -- Używa algorytmu prawdziwej sfery zamiast chudszej wersji z klasycznymi nubami snajperskimi. Wartość domyślna to false.
voxelsniper.brush.comet.info:
&cOstrzeżenie: Tego pędzla nie da się cofnąć! Możesz użyć //ex, aby ugasić ogień, który tworzy.
&6Parametry Pędzla Komety:
&b/b com balls [big|small] -- Ustala rozmiar kulki.
voxelsniper.brush.copy-pasta.info:
&6Parametry Pędzla CopyPasta:
&b/b cp air -- Przełącza włącza (domyślne) lub wyłącza powietrze podczas wklejania.
&b/b cp [0|90|180|270] -- Przełącza rotację. Domyślnie jest to 0.
voxelsniper.brush.drain.info:
&6Parametry pędzla drenującego:
&b/b drain [true|false] -- Używa algorytmu prawdziwej sfery zamiast chudszej wersji z klasycznymi nubami snajperskimi. Wartość domyślna to false.
&b/b drain d -- Przełącza tryb drenażu dysku, w przeciwieństwie do trybu drenażu kuli.
voxelsniper.brush.erode.info:
&6Parametry Pędzla Erozji:
&b/b e f [n] -- Ustawia powierzchnie erozji na n.
&b/b e e [n] -- Ustawia powierzchnie wypełnienia na n.
&b/b e F [n] -- Ustawia rekursję erozji na n.
&b/b e E [n] -- Ustawia rekursję wypełnienia na n.
&6Ustawienia wstępne pędzla erozji:
&b/b eb default -- Ustawia powierzchnię erozji na 0, rekursję erozji na 1, powierzchnię wypełnienia na 0 i rekursję wypełnienia na 1.
&b/b eb melt -- Ustawia powierzchnię erozji na 2, rekursję erozji na 1, powierzchnię wypełnienia na 5 i rekursję wypełnienia na 1.
&b/b eb fill -- Ustawia powierzchnie erozji na 5, rekursję erozji na 1, powierzchnie wypełnienia na 2 i rekursję wypełnienia na 1.
&b/b eb smooth -- Ustawia powierzchnie erozji na 3, rekursje erozji na 1, powierzchnie wypełnienia na 3 i rekursje wypełnienia na 1.
&b/b eb lift -- Ustawia powierzchnie erozji na 6, rekursje erozji na 0, powierzchnie wypełnienia na 1 i rekursje wypełnienia na 1.
&b/b eb floatclean -- Ustawia powierzchnie erozji na 0, rekursje erozji na 1, powierzchnie wypełnienia na 6 i rekursje wypełnienia na 1.
voxelsniper.brush.extrude.info:
&6Extrude Brush Parameters:
&b/b ex [true|false] -- Uses a true circle algorithm instead of the skinnier version with classic sniper nubs. Default is false.
voxelsniper.brush.flat-ocean.info:
&6Flat Ocean Brush Parameters:
&b/b fo yo [n] -- Sets the level to which the water will rise to n.
&b/b fo yl [n] -- Sets the level to which the ocean floor will rise to n.
voxelsniper.brush.generate-tree.info:
&6Generate Tree Brush Parameters:x
&b/b gt default -- Restores default parameters.
&b/b gt lt [t] -- Sets leaf type to t. (e.g. oak_leaves)
&b/b gt wt [t] -- Sets wood type to t. (e.g. oak_log)
&b/b gt tt [n] -- Sets tree thickness to n. (whole number)
&b/b gt rf [true|false] -- Sets root float.
&b/b gt sh [n] -- Sets starting height to n. (whole number)
&b/b gt rl [n] -- Sets root length to n. (whole number)
&b/b gt ts [n] -- Sets trunk slope chance to n. (0-100)
&b/b gt bl [n] -- Sets branch length to n. (whole number)
&b/b gt minr [n] -- Sets minimum roots to n. (whole number)
&b/b gt maxr [n] -- Sets maximum roots to n. (whole number)
&b/b gt minh [n] -- Sets minimum height to n. (whole number)
&b/b gt maxh [n] -- Sets maximum height to n. (whole number)
&b/b gt minl [n] -- Sets minimum leaf node size to n. (whole number)
&b/b gt maxl [n] -- Sets maximum leaf node size to n. (whole number)
voxelsniper.brush.heat-ray.info:
&6Heat Ray Brush Parameters:
&b/b hr oct [n] -- Sets octave parameter to n for the noise generator.
&b/b hr amp [n] -- Sets amplitude parameter to n for the noise generator.
&b/b hr freq [n] -- Sets frequency parameter to n for the noise generator.
voxelsniper.brush.jockey.info:
&6Jockey Brush Parameters:
&b/b jockey t [t] -- Sets the selected jockey type to t.
&b/b jockey [true|false] [true|false] [true|false] -- Sets whether players only or entities should be affected, whether entities should be inverted and whether entities should be stacked.
voxelsniper.brush.jockey.top-ejected: &6Osoba znajdująca się na tobie została zrzucona!
voxelsniper.brush.move.info:
&3Use arrow and gunpowder to define two points.
&6Move Brush Parameters:
&b/b mv x [n] -- Sets the x direction to n. (positive => east)
&b/b mv y [n] -- Sets the y direction to n. (positive => up)
&b/b mv z [n] -- Sets the z direction to n. (positive => south)
&b/b mv reset -- Resets the brush. (x:0 y:0 z:0)
voxelsniper.brush.move.invalid-new-selec: &cNowa selekcja ma więcej bloków niż oryginalna selekcja. Taka sytuacja nigdy nie powinna mieć miejsca!
voxelsniper.brush.ocean.info:
&6Ocean Brush Parameters:
&b/b o wlevel [n] -- Sets the water level to n.
&b/b o cfloor [true|false] -- Enables or disables sea floor cover. (e.g. /b o cfloor true -> Cover material will be your voxel material.)
voxelsniper.brush.pull.info:
&6Pull Brush Parameters:
&b/b pull [p] [b] -- Sets pinch to p and bubble to b.
voxelsniper.brush.regenerate-chunk.info:
&6Regenerate Chunk Brush Parameters:
&b/b gc [t] -- Sets the selected regen biome type to t.
&b/b gc list -- Lists all available biomes.
voxelsniper.brush.regenerate-chunk.gener: &7Generating that chunk using &b{0} &7biome, this might take a while! &8({1}, {2}, {3})
voxelsniper.brush.regenerate-chunk.warni: &dThis brush will melt your spleen and sell your kidneys.
voxelsniper.brush.ruler.info:
&3Right click first point with the arrow. Right click with gunpowder for distances from that block (can repeat without getting a new first block.) For placing blocks, use arrow and input the desired coordinates with parameters.
&6Ruler Brush Parameters:
&b/b r [x] [y] [z] -- Places blocks one at a time of the type you have set with /v at the location you click + this many units away. If you don't include a value, it will be zero. Don't include ANY values, and the brush will just measure distance.
&b/b r ruler -- Resets the tool to just measure distances, not layout blocks.
voxelsniper.brush.ruler.warning: &cWarning: You did not select a first coordinate with the arrow. Comparing to point 0,0,0 instead.
voxelsniper.brush.scanner.info:
&6Scanner Brush Parameters:
&b/b sc d [d] -- Sets the search depth to d. Clamps to 1 - 64.
voxelsniper.brush.sign-overwrite.info:
&3The arrow writes the internal line buffer to the target sign.
&3The gunpowder reads the text of the target sign into the internal buffer.
&3Colors can be used using the "&" symbol.
&6Sign Overwrite Brush Parameters:
&b/b sio 1 [set|toggle] (...) -- Sets the text of the first sign line. (e.g. /b sio 1 set Blah Blah | /b sio 1 toggle)
&b/b sio 2 [set|toggle] (...) -- Sets the text of the second sign line. (e.g. /b sio 2 set Blah Blah | /b sio 2 toggle
&b/b sio 3 [set|toggle] (...) -- Sets the text of the third sign line. (e.g. /b sio 3 set Blah Blah | /b sio 3 toggle
&b/b sio 4 [set|toggle] (...) -- Sets the text of the fourth sign line. (e.g. /b sio 4 set Blah Blah | /b sio 4 toggle
&b/b sio clear -- Clears the line buffer. (Alias: /b sio c)
&b/b sio clearall -- Clears the line buffer and sets all lines back to enabled (Alias: /b sio ca)
&b/b sio side [s] -- Sets the sign side to s. (not available in versions prior to 1.20)
&b/b sio multiple [true|false] -- Enables or disables ranged mode. (see Wiki for more information) (Alias: /b sio m [true|false])
&b/b sio save [n] -- Save you buffer to a file named n. (Alias: /b sio s [n])
&b/b sio open [n] -- Loads a buffer from a file named n. (Alias: /b sio o [n])
voxelsniper.brush.sign-overwrite.cleared: &9Internal text buffer cleared and states back to enabled.
voxelsniper.brush.sign-overwrite.invalid: &cWarning: Text on line &b{0} &cexceeds the maximum line length of &b{1} &ccharacters. Your text will be cut.
voxelsniper.brush.sign-overwrite.legacy-: &cWarning: Two-sided signs are not available in your version.
voxelsniper.brush.sign-overwrite.no-sign: &cDid not found any sign in selection box.
voxelsniper.brush.spiral-staircase.info:
&6Spiral Staircase Brush Parameters:
&b/vh [n] -- Sets height to n.
&b/v [b] -- Sets block/step/stair to b.
&b/b sstair [c|cc] -- Sets the turning direction of staircase.
&b/b sstair [n|e|s|w] -- Sets the opening direction of staircase.
voxelsniper.brush.tree-snipe.info:
&6Tree Snipe Brush Parameters:
&b/b t [t] -- Sets the selected tree type to t.
&b/b t list -- Lists all available trees.
voxelsniper.brush.voltmeter.usage: &dRight click with arrow to see if blocks/faces are powered. Gunpowder measures wire current.
voxelsniper.brush.disc.info:
&6Disc Brush Parameters:
&b/b d [true|false] -- Uses a true circle algorithm instead of the skinnier version with classic sniper nubs. (false is default)
voxelsniper.brush.disc-face.info:
&6Disc Brush Parameters:
&b/b d [true|false] -- Uses a true circle algorithm instead of the skinnier version with classic sniper nubs. (false is default)
voxelsniper.brush.splatter-ball.info:
&6Splatter Ball Brush Parameters:
&b/b sb s [n] -- Sets a seed percentage to n (1-9999). 100 = 1% Default is 1000.
&b/b sb g [n] -- Sets a growth percentage to n (1-9999). Default is 1000.
&b/b sb r [n] -- Sets a recursion i (1-10). Default is 3.
voxelsniper.brush.splatter-disc.info:
&6Splatter Disc Brush Parameters:
&b/b sd s [n] -- Sets a seed percentage to n (1-9999). 100 = 1% Default is 1000.
&b/b sd g [n] -- Sets a growth percentage to n (1-9999). Default is 1000.
&b/b sd r [n] -- Sets a recursion i (1-10). Default is 3.
voxelsniper.brush.splatter-overlay.info:
&6Splatter Overlay Brush Parameters:
&b/b sover all -- Sets the brush to overlay over ALL materials, not just natural surface ones (will no longer ignore trees and buildings).
&b/b sover some -- Sets the brush to overlay over natural surface materials.
&b/b sover randh -- Sets whether height should be randomized or not.
&b/b sover d [n] -- Sets how many blocks deep you want to replace from the surface to n.
&b/b sover s [n] -- Sets a seed percentage to n (1-9999). 100 = 1% Default is 1000.
&b/b sover g [n] -- Sets a growth percentage to n (1-9999). Default is 1000.
&b/b sover r [n] -- Sets a recursion to n (1-10). Default is 3.
&b/b sover yoff [n] -- Sets y offset to n.
voxelsniper.brush.splatter-voxel.info:
&6Splatter Voxel Brush Parameters:
&b/b sv s [n] -- Sets a seed percentage to n (1-9999). 100 = 1% Default is 1000.
&b/b sv g [n] -- Sets a growth percentage to n (1-9999). Default is 1000.
&b/b sv r [n] -- Sets a recursion i (1-10). Default is 3.
voxelsniper.brush.splatter-voxel-disc.in:
&6Splatter Voxel Disc Brush Parameters:
&b/b svd s [n] -- Sets a seed percentage to n (1-9999). 100 = 1% Default is 1000.
&b/b svd g [n] -- Sets a growth percentage to n (1-9999). Default is 1000.
&b/b svd r [n] -- Sets a recursion i (1-10). Default is 3.
voxelsniper.brush.blend-ball.info:
&6Blend Ball Brush Parameters:
&b/b bb water -- Toggles include or exclude (default) water.
voxelsniper.brush.blend-disc.info:
&6Blend Disc Brush Parameters:
&b/b bb water -- Toggles include or exclude (default) water.
voxelsniper.brush.blend-voxel.info:
&6Blend Voxel Brush Parameters:
&b/b bb water -- Toggles include or exclude (default) water.
voxelsniper.brush.blend-voxel-disc.info:
&6Blend Voxel Disc Brush Parameters:
&b/b bb water -- Toggles include or exclude (default) water.
voxelsniper.brush.canyon.info:
&6Canyon Brush Parameters:
&b/b ca y [n] -- Sets the y-level to which the land will be shifted down to n.
voxelsniper.brush.entity.info:
&6Entity Brush Parameters:
&b/b en [t] -- Sets the selected entity type to t.
&b/b en list -- Lists all available entities.
voxelsniper.brush.entity-removal.info:
&6Entity Removal Brush Parameters:
&b/b er + [t] -- Adds an exemption.
&b/b er - [t] -- Removes an exemption.
&b/b er list -- Lists all exemptions.
voxelsniper.brush.set-redstone-flip.info:
&6Set Redstone Flip Brush Parameters:
&b/b setrf [d] -- Valid direction inputs are: n, s, ns, e, w, ew. Sets the direction that you wish to flip your repeaters, defaults to north/south.
voxelsniper.brush.rotation-2d.info:
&3The gradian is a unit of angle measurement different from the degree. On average, {0} degrees = {1} radians.
&6Rotation 2D Brush Parameters:
&b/b rot2 [n] -- Sets rotation angle to n.
voxelsniper.brush.rotation-2d-vertical.i:
&3The gradian is a unit of angle measurement different from the degree. On average, {0} degrees = {1} radians.
&6Rotation 2D Vertical Brush Parameters:
&b/b rot2v [n] -- Sets rotation angle to n.
voxelsniper.brush.rotation-3d.info:
&3The gradian is a unit of angle measurement different from the degree. On average, {0} degrees = {1} radians.
&6Rotation 3D Brush Parameters:
&b/b rot3 p [n] -- Sets degrees of pitch rotation to n (rotation about the Z axis).
&b/b rot3 r [n] -- Sets degrees of roll rotation to n (rotation about the X axis).
&b/b rot3 y [n] -- Sets degrees of yaw rotation to n (Rotation about the Y axis).
voxelsniper.brush.rotation-3d.set-z-angl: &aAngle around Z axis set to: &f{0} gradians ({1} degrees)
voxelsniper.brush.rotation-3d.set-x-angl: &aAngle around X axis set to: &f{0} gradians ({1} degrees)
voxelsniper.brush.rotation-3d.set-y-angl: &aAngle around Y axis set to: &f{0} gradians ({1} degrees)
voxelsniper.brush.clone-stamp.info:
&6Clone Stamp Brush Parameters:
&b/b cs f -- Activates Fill mode.
&b/b cs a -- Activates No-Air mode.
&b/b cs d -- Activates Default mode.
&b/b cs c [n] -- Sets center to n.
voxelsniper.brush.stencil-list.missing-f: &cYou did not specify a filename for the stencil(s). This is required.
voxelsniper.brush.stencil.info:
&6Stencil Brush Parameters:
&b/b st (full|fill|replace) [s] -- Loads the specified stencil s. Full/fill/replace must come first. Full = paste all blocks, fill = paste only into air blocks, replace = paste full blocks in only, but replace anything in their way.
voxelsniper.brush.stencil.loaded: &9Stencil &b"{0}" &9exists and is loaded. Make sure you are using gunpowder if you do not want any chance of overwriting the file.
voxelsniper.brush.stencil.missing: &cStencil &b"{0}" &cdoes not exist. Ready to be saved to, but cannot be pasted.
voxelsniper.brush.stencil.invalid-stenci: &cYou need to type a valid stencil name.
voxelsniper.brush.stencil.area-too-large: &cArea selected is too large. (Limit is {0} blocks)
voxelsniper.brush.stencil-list.info:
&6Stencil List Brush Parameters:
&b/b sl (full|fill|replace) [s] -- Loads the specified stencil list s. Full/fill/replace must come first. Full = paste all blocks, fill = paste only into air blocks, replace = paste full blocks in only, but replace anything in their way.
voxelsniper.brush.stencil-list.missing: &cStencil List &b"{0}" &cdoes not exist. This brush will not function without a valid stencil list.
voxelsniper.brush.stencil-list.invalid-s: &cYou need to type a valid stencil list name.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.ball.info:
&6Ball Brush Parameters:
&b/b b [true|false] -- Uses a true sphere algorithm instead of the skinnier version with classic sniper nubs. Default is false.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.blob.info:
&6Blob Brush Parameters:
&b/b blob g [n] -- Sets the growth percentage to n ({0}-{1}). Default is {2}.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.checker-voxe:
&6Checker Voxel Disc Brush Parameters:
&b/b cvd [true|false] -- Enables or disables using World Coordinates.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.cylinder.inf:
&6Cylinder Brush Parameters:
&b/b c [true|false] -- Uses a true circle algorithm instead of the skinnier version with classic sniper nubs. (false is default)
&b/b c h [n] -- Sets the cylinder v.voxelHeight to n. Default is 1.
&b/b c c [n] -- Sets the origin of the cylinder compared to the target block to n. Positive numbers will move the cylinder upward, negative will move it downward.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.ellipse.info:
&6Ellipse Brush Parameters:
&b/b el fill -- Toggles fill mode. Default is false.
&b/b el x [n] -- Sets X size modifier to n.
&b/b el y [n] -- Sets Y size modifier to n.
&b/b el t [n] -- Sets the amount of time steps.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.ellipsoid.in:
&6Ellipsoid Brush Parameters:
&b/b elo [true|false] -- Toggles offset. Default is false.
&b/b elo x [n] -- Sets X radius to n.
&b/b elo y [n] -- Sets Y radius to n.
&b/b elo z [n] -- Sets Z radius to n.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.fill-down.in:
&6Fill Down Brush Parameters:
&b/b fd [true|false] -- Uses a true circle algorithm. Default is false.
&b/b fd all -- Fills into liquids as well. (Default)
&b/b fd some -- Fills only into air.
&b/b fd e -- Fills into only existing blocks. (Toggle)
&b/b fd y [n] -- Sets the min y to n. (Must be >= than {0})
voxelsniper.performer-brush.fill-down.se: &bFilling liquids as well as air is {0}
&3Right click first point with the arrow. Right click with gunpowder to draw a jagged line to set the second point.
&6Jagged Line Brush Parameters:
&b/b j r [n] - Sets the number of recursions to n. Default is {0}, must be an integer {1}-{2}.
&b/b j s [n] - Sets the spread to n. Default is {3}.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.line.info: &3Right click first point with the arrow. Right click with gunpowder to draw a line to set the second point.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.overlay.info:
&6Overlay Brush Parameters:
&b/b over all -- Sets the brush to overlay over ALL materials, not just natural surface ones (will no longer ignore trees and buildings).
&b/b over some -- Sets the brush to overlay over natural surface materials.
&b/b over d [n] -- Sets how many blocks deep you want to replace from the surface to n.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.punish.info:
&6Punish Brush Parameters:
&b/vc [n] -- Sets Punishment level to n.
&b/vh [n] -- Sets Punishment duration to n.
&b/b p [p] -- Sets Punishment to p.
&b/b p toggleSM [s] -- Makes Punish Brush only affect s player name.
&b/b p toggleSelf -- Toggles whether you get hit as well.
&b/b p toggleHypnoLandscape -- Makes Hypno punishment only affect landscape.
&b/b p list -- Lists all available punishments.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.punish.hit-s: &bYour punishments will now affect you too!
voxelsniper.performer-brush.punish.hit-o: &bYour punishments will no longer affect you!
voxelsniper.performer-brush.ring.info:
&6Ring Brush Parameters:
&b/b ri [true|false] -- Uses a true circle algorithm instead of the skinnier version with classic sniper nubs. (false is default)
&b/b ri ir [n] -- Sets the inner radius to n units.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.spline.info:
&6Spline Brush Parameters:
&b/b sp ss -- Enables endpoint selection mode for desired curve.
&b/b sp sc -- Enables control point selection mode for desired curve.
&b/b sp clear -- Clears out the curve selection.
&b/b sp ren -- Renders curve from control points.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.spline.missi: &cSome endpoints or control points are missing.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.spline.not-i: &cThat block is not in the endpoint selection set.
&cThat block is not in the control point selection set.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.spline.not-e: &cNot enough points selected: {0} endpoints, {1} control points.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.three-point-:
&3Select three corners with the arrow brush, then generate the Circle with the gunpowder brush.
&6Three Point Circle Brush Parameters:
&b/b tpc [t] -- Sets the calculations to emphasize accuracy or smoothness to t.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.triangle.inf: &3Select three corners with the arrow brush, then generate the triangle with the gunpowder brush.
voxelsniper.performer-brush.underlay.inf:
&6Underlay Brush Parameters:
&b/b under all -- Sets the brush to underlay over ALL materials, not just natural surface ones (will no longer ignore trees and buildings).
&b/b un,der some -- Sets the brush to underlay over natural surface materials.
&b/b under d [n] -- Sets the number of blocks thick to change to n.
voxelsniper.warning.brush.first-coordina: &cWarning: You did not select a first coordinate with the arrow.
voxelsniper.error.brush.invalid-selectio: &cRozmiar zaznaczenia powyżej limitu {0}, użyj mniejszego zaznaczenia.
